title: Grand Opening: Serene Bangkok Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Daily Free-Flow Hour
description:
Escape the buzz of Bangkok at your stylish new home-away-from-home in the heart of the action. This five-star hotel is a breath of fresh air where contemporary cool meets warm Thai hospitality. You're smack bang in the middle of the city's most vibrant neighbourhood, where local street food vendors rub shoulders with lavish rooftop bars and boutique shopping malls. 

Prepare for knockout facilities that will make you never want to leave. Take a dip in the dreamy outdoor pool, surrounded by swaying palms and plush sunbeds. Foodies are in for a treat with Kwann's mouthwatering charcoal Thai cooking, Leaf Bar & Eatery's curated cocktails and Sage Table's superfood-packed breakfasts.
offer_address: 73/7-8 Soi Sukhumvit 13, Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Lush Bangkok City Break with Lagoon-Style Pool, Daily Breakfast & THB500 Dining Credit
description:
Find yourself in the heart of Bangkok with a stay at this laidback hotel just minutes from Victory Monument and Ratchaprarop Station. From here, you can easily hop on the BTS to explore temples, browse Chatuchak Weekend Market, or indulge in some shopping at Pratunam and Siam’s megamalls. Then, return to your well-appointed room, equipped with everything for a fuss-free stay, or cool off with a dip in the lagoon-style pool.

Tuck into Thai and international dishes at the all-day dining Jess Restaurant, and savour Italian classics at Roberto. Sip on signature cocktails at the bar, test your aim at the pool table and sample baked delights from the onsite patisserie. Whether you're in Bangkok to explore or unwind, this stay keeps you close to the action without the overwhelm.
offer_address: 9 Ratchaprarop Road, Pratunam-Victory Monument, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Sky-High Bangkok Suites with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks, Butler Service & Exclusive Rooftop Pool Access
description:
Embrace endless opulence in the buzzing, surprise-filled heart of Thailand’s capital with a stay at the five-star 137 Pillars Suites & Residences Bangkok. Each sleek, masterfully appointed suite boasts a private balcony and dazzling skyline views of the shining city below, and the hotel’s central location makes exploring the city’s wealth of museums, world-class dining venues and high-end shopping boutiques a breeze. With four sumptuous restaurants and bars, a world-class onsite spa, a soaring 27th-floor infinity pool and a personalised butler service, it’s the perfect choice for the sophisticated traveller seeking Bangkok’s very best.

137 Pillars Suites & Residences is a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, and the hotel’s commitment to excellence is guaranteed to impress. Have an unforgettable Bangkok stay with a range of extraordinary cultural experiences, including the hotel’s own unique private art tour, a visit to the Queen Sirikit Silk Museum and an excursion to the waterfall-clad megamall EmQuartier (additional charges apply).
offer_address: 59/1 Soi Sukhumvit 39, Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Sky-High Central Bangkok Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Club Lounge Access
description:
Fall in love with Bangkok’s thriving CBD and enjoy a five-star stay at this sky-high urban oasis. This is the perfect base to discover the city's bright lights, world-class shopping and diverse culture with absolute ease.

Sip cocktails at Moon Bar, one of Bangkok's best rooftop bars that boasts unrivalled views of the city skyline. Embark on a culinary journey across seven restaurants offering expertly prepared dishes, from Thai classics to modern Cantonese cuisine. Indulge and unwind in this urban haven with a visit to the renowned Banyan Tree Spa Bangkok or the onsite Banyan Tree Gallery. Enjoy exclusive Club Lounge access, a private retreat for luxury and comfort.

Housed in one of Asia’s tallest buildings, this opulent hotel is a short drive from some of Bangkok's most popular sights, including the crimson Buddhist temple Wat Pathum Wanaram, Lumphini Park and Pratunam Market.
offer_address: 21/100 South Sathon Road, Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Suite Stay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Executive Lounge Access
description:
In this city-centre retreat, European-inspired opulence finds an unlikely home among Bangkok's sparkling skyline. Retire to plush tranquillity in your self-contained suite, before heading out to explore the Chit Lom Langsuan neighbourhood's shopping and dining scene. Escape the heat with a plunge in the outdoor pool, feel your stresses soak away in the steam room and sauna, or treat yourself to authentic Italian plates on the balcony at No.43 Italian Bistro.

The city's top attractions are within easy reach; picturesque Lumphini Park is a brisk stroll away, while the BTS subway network has a stop a convenient five-minute walk from your front door. Fancy a big night on the town? Hop in a taxi, and in less than 20 minutes you'll be among the vibrant bars and restaurants of Khao San Road.
offer_address: 43 Phloen Chit Road, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

vendor_name: Hilton Bangkok Grande Asoke (formerly Pullman Bangkok Grande Sukhumvit)
title: Five-Star Pullman Stay with Club Access
description: Discover an elegant oasis in one of the world’s most unique cities in true Pullman style and experience sophistication perched high above Bangkok’s pulsing streets. Enjoy exclusive access to the club lounge and all its benefits - daily breakfast, two hours of nightly, free-flow cocktails and canapes, daily afternoon tea, all-day refreshments, coffee and more - as you discover the allure of this vibrant city, staying in the heart of Sukhumvit Road with easy access to the BTS Skytrain and MRT subway. Plus, truly unwind with a 30-minute head and shoulder massage each.
offer_address: 30 Sukhumvit 21 Asoke Road, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Thai Opulence at The Peninsula Bangkok
description: Discover the gilded temples, floating markets and world-class dining of Thailand's capital with three nights of five-star luxury at one of Bangkok's best hotels, The Peninsula Bangkok. Includes daily buffet breakfasts, one three-course dinner or 60-minute massage, nightly Peninsula signature cocktails, complimentary boat shuttle service across the river and more.
offer_address: 333 Charoennakorn Road, Klongsan, 10600, Thailand

title: Contemporary City Stay in the Heart of Bangkok
description: Discover the gilded temples, floating markets and world-class dining of Thailand's capital with a two, three or five-night stay at the modern Lit Bangkok Hotel & Residence with daily breakfast, two cocktails to share and a THB1300 spa credit to share.
offer_address: 36/1 Kasem San 1 Alley, Khwaeng Wang Mai, Khet Pathum Wan, กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

title: Contemporary Pullman Bangkok Escape with Daily Breakfast & Skywalk Experience
description:
The glittering lights of Bangkok's spectacular cityscape await you at the contemporary Pullman Bangkok King Power. Indulge in world-class dining at the hotel's trendy restaurants or bars, splash around in the shimmering pool or unwind at the spa or fitness centre. Leave it all behind to check out the nearby Siam Square One or the majestic Mahanakhon SkyWalk.

Bangkok is known for its eccentric mix of contemporary and traditional elements, with impressive floating markets, gilded temples and mouthwatering cuisine found in local vendors and award-winning dining venues. Immerse yourself in the renowned shopping districts and historic culture before returning to your peaceful oasis in the middle of this bustling city.
offer_address: 8/2 Rangnam Road, Thanon-Phayathai, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Sky-High Central Bangkok Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Discover the vibrant energy of Bangkok with a stay at this sophisticated retreat, perfectly situated near the dynamic Sukhumvit district. This hotel's exceptional location makes exploring the city's rich cultural heritage and modern charm effortless, while its contemporary amenities, including a serene outdoor pool on the seventh floor, offer a peaceful escape from the urban buzz.

After a day of exploring Bangkok’s highlights - whether marvelling at the Grand Palace’s stunning architecture, enjoying the tranquil lakeside views at Lumphini Park or soaking in the lively atmosphere of Khao San Road - return to the hotel’s stylish restaurant. Indulge in a blend of international and Asian flavours in an elegant setting, and conclude your evening with an hour of free-flowing cocktails at the chic Open Bar.
offer_address: 12 Sukhumvit Soi 2, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Stylish SO/ Bangkok Stay with Sky-High Club Access & Daily Cocktails
description:
Live the high life at SO/ Bangkok with exclusive Club Signature executive lounge access. Spectacularly located on the 25th floor with views over Bangkok, the stylish lounge is a space to indulge in complimentary daily breakfast, all-day soft drinks and snacks, afternoon tea and evening cocktails.

Your escape also includes the option of daily buffet breakfast at Red Oven restaurant, THB1,000 spa credit per adult, per day, plus a complimentary signature cocktail per adult to enjoy at one of two rooftop bars.

Two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free of charge with daily breakfast and club access.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 2 N Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

title: Stylish Wellness Retreat with Club Access in the Heart of Bangkok
description:
Make Mövenpick Bangkok your inner-city oasis in Thailand’s vibrant capital. Spend your days exploring the attractions and restaurants on your doorstep, then return to this blissful retreat that places an emphasis on wellbeing with fresh, healthy cuisine and the adjoining BDMS Wellness Clinic with brand-new fitness centre. Of course, in true Mövenpick style, there's also a daily chocolate hour and their famous ice cream, for those who fancy a naughty-but-nice treat.

Enjoy daily breakfast, one incredible dining experience and exclusive access to the Club Lounge, offering a nightly open bar with beer, wine and spirits, afternoon snacks, all-day non-alcoholic refreshments and the option to enjoy breakfast in the lounge.

Plus, up to two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free with daily breakfast and one dinner (one dish per child) from the kids' menu.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 2 Witthayu Road, Lumpini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Bangkok Boutique Opulence with Rooftop Cocktails, Daily Breakfast & Lounge Access
description:
Soak up Bangkok's electric atmosphere while experiencing the epitome of boutique style with a glamorous stay at Hotel Muse Bangkok Langsuan - MGallery. Let the hotel’s 1920s-inspired decor sweep you away, especially at the jewel in the hotel’s crown: the prohibition-themed Speakeasy Rooftop Bar, which serves up a gastronomic adventure as the sun sets over the sprawling metropolis.

Indulge in the hotel’s high-class facilities, from the fully-equipped gym and sparkling pool boasting panoramic views, to four exciting restaurants and bars. From a central Langsuan location, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore Siam, Sukhumvit and Silom - all within easy reach.
offer_address: 55/555 Langsuan Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Bangkok Designer Escape with Daily À La Carte Breakfast, VIP Club Lounge Access & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Make your stay amid Bangkok’s vibrant city streets a memorable one at Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok, an artsy hotel ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor. The hotel boasts a superb central location surrounded by some of the city’s best shops and restaurants. Must-visit sights are close by, including BTS National Stadium, Jim Thompson House, glittering shopping malls and historic temples.

Along with eye-catching décor and unique artwork, the hotel offers fabulous facilities, creating an oasis amid the thrum of the city. Enjoy breathtaking views over the city skyline, take a dip in the infinity pool flanked by rows of sun loungers and dine in the art gallery-inspired Chim Chim restaurant.
offer_address: 865 Rama 1 Road Bangkok 10330 Thailand

title: Award-Winning Five-Star SO/ Bangkok Stay with Club Signature Access & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Spoil your senses with a sublime five-star stay at SO/ Bangkok - an outrageously fashionable sanctuary ranked among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Part of the sophisticated, fashion-led SO/ Hotels & Resorts, this tranquil hideaway radiates contemporary cool and has mastered the art of bold theatrical design. Designed by legendary couturier Christian Lacroix, the hotel oozes French elegance, with fantasy and folklore design elements seamlessly integrated throughout, from modernist retrofitted furniture and eclectic wallpapers to playful staff uniforms.

In-between bouts of exploring the city, the 25th-floor Club Signature lounge is the perfect spot to indulge in spectacular Bangkok city views with an extensive range of benefits. Take a dip in the stunning infinity pool, which looks out onto leafy Lumphini Park, sweat it out in the state-of-the-art gym, or pamper yourself at the tranquil SO/ SPA. Discovering the city is made easy with Lumphini MRT and Sala Daeng BTS train stations, both within easy walking distance. Known for awe-inspiring ancient temples, buzzing nightlife, and tempting street food, Bangkok is a unique urban centre that should be on everyone’s bucket list - and SO/ Bangkok ensures you do it all in style.
offer_address: 2 North Sathon Road, Si Lom, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Ultra-Chic Five-Star SO/ Bangkok City Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Spoil your senses with a stay at an outrageously fashionable sanctuary located in Bangkok's lively entertainment district. Part of the sophisticated, fashion-led SO/ Hotels & Resorts, this tranquil hideaway radiates contemporary cool and has mastered the art of theatricality. Designed by legendary couturier Christian Lacroix, the hotel oozes French elegance, with fantasy and folklore elements seamlessly integrated throughout, from modernist retrofitted furniture and eclectic wallpapers to playful staff uniforms.

Between bouts of exploring the city, indulge in spectacular city views. Take a dip in the stunning rooftop infinity pool, which looks out onto leafy Lumphini Park, stay active in the state-of-the-art SO/ FIT gym and pamper yourself at the tranquil SO/ SPA, rated the best spa in Bangkok by Tripadvisor. Known for awe-inspiring ancient temples, buzzing nightlife and tempting street food, Bangkok is a unique urban centre that should be on every bucket list - and SO/ Bangkok ensures you do it all in style.
offer_address: 2 North Sathon Road, Si Lom, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Bangkok All-Suite Luxury with Club Lounge Access, Daily Breakfast & Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Experience the best Bangkok has to offer at this five-star all-suite lavish retreat, home to two Michelin-star restaurants - Mezzaluna and Chef's Table - the iconic rooftop Sky Bar and the world's tallest gin, caviar and vodka bar, lebua No.3.

Blessed with an enviable position between the 51st and the 59th floors of State Tower - one of Thailand's tallest buildings - this luxe property features an open-air swimming pool with soaring views over the glittering city and a fully-equipped fitness centre, the perfect place to maintain your workout regime.

When you’re ready for royalty treatment, head to Café Mozu for a culinary journey around the world or visit the Tower Club Lounge to enjoy perks including daily dining and free-flowing drinks alongside panoramic Bangkok views.

If you can drag yourself away, you're only a 15-minute drive to some of Bangkok’s must-see sights, including Wat Arun riverside temple, the buzzing Chatuchak Weekend Market and the Royal Grand Palace.
offer_address: 1055 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Bangkok: Restaurant POTONG Indulgent 20-Course Dining Experience with Chef Meet-and-Greet
description:
Head to the heart of bustling Bangkok for an indulgent 20-course tasting experience at Restaurant POTONG, the restaurant of Chef Pam - one of Thailand's most influential chefs, who featured in Forbes' coveted 30 Under 30 list.

History and innovation collide at this acclaimed, progressive Thai-Chinese restaurant, hidden in a 120-year-old building in the thrumming city. Embark on a sensory culinary journey inspired by the following five elements - salt, acid, spice, texture and the Maillard reaction (a chemical reaction between amino acids and reducing sugars that gives browned food its distinctive flavour) - and a nod to both traditional and progressive flavours. Complete your experience with an after-dinner drink and a fascinating meet-and-greet with Chef Pam, who'll share the inspiration behind her work. This is a truly exciting way to experience the flavours of South East Asia that will leave you amazed as you make your way through each course - cooked and prepared to perfection.
offer_address: 422 Vanich Rd. Samphanthawong Bangkok, 10100

title: Iconic Sofitel Stay with Exclusive Club Privileges
description: Experience a celebrity-style getaway at SO Sofitel Bangkok with exclusive Club Signature Lounge access. Spectacularly located on the 25th floor with views over Bangkok, this peaceful oasis above the city is where you can indulge in daily afternoon tea, evening cocktails, all-day refreshments and more. Your escape also includes daily buffet breakfast, a blissful 30-minute massage and late 2pm checkout (subject to availability).
offer_address: 2 N Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

title: Pullman Bangkok Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Club Lounge Access & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Experience signature Pullman elegance with a five-star stay high above the vibrant streets of Bangkok. Escape to one of the most desirable addresses in Thailand, where a relaxing oasis awaits, complete with a stunning Exclusive Club Lounge on the hotel’s 27th floor.

Bangkok’s world-renowned attractions and hidden gems are at your fingertips. You’ll find the vibrant nightlife of Silom Road nearby, home to Patpong Night Market and Lumphini Park, and for gravity-defying, 360-degree views of the city, the Mahanakhon Skywalk is within a five-minute walk.

After busy days exploring the city, retreat to the 37th-floor Scarlett Wine Bar & Restaurant. Voted one of Thailand’s Best Restaurants in the Michelin guide, Scarlett allows you to pair near-uninterrupted rooftop panoramas with your perfectly cooked sirloin steak and a glass of fine red wine.

Sophisticated cocktails are called for at the onsite lobby bar 25 Degrees, where hungry guests can also satisfy midnight cravings at the 24-hour burger restaurant, regarded as one of Bangkok’s best burger joints. For days of pure relaxation, stretch out by the swimming pool or visit the onsite spa.
offer_address: 188 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Bangkok Self-Contained Sukhumvit Suites with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Dining Credit
description:
Moments of bliss amid the bustling city of Bangkok abound at this inner-city gem. Sharing their address with three onsite restaurants and a glistening rooftop pool, these ultra-chic apartments - boasting fully equipped kitchens and open-plan study and living spaces - are ideal for business travellers and seekers of leisure alike.

In between restaurant-hopping and retail-hunting on the humming streets of Bangkok’s Watthana District, take advantage of the hotel’s steam room, sauna and landscaped garden. At nightfall, Above Eleven Rooftop Bar & Restaurant welcomes you to be part of the city's sparkling skyline while sipping handcrafted cocktails.
offer_address: 38/8 Sukhumvit Road, Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: VIP City Stay with Lounge Access & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description: Soak up the electric atmosphere of Bangkok while experiencing Club Lounge access in the city’s quirkiest hotel: Hotel Muse Bangkok Langsuan, part of the boutique MGallery Collection by Sofitel. Experience a city stay like never before in this 1920’s inspired hotel as you indulge in daily buffet breakfast, access to the Club La Boutique lounge and all its benefits including nightly free-flow drinks and snacks and a dining experience during your stay.
offer_address: 55/555 Langsuan Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Sky-High Central Bangkok Retreat with 16th-Floor Infinity Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Contemporary opulence sparkling above Si Phraya Road awaits at this sky-high haven. As the inaugural hotel in Bangkok's dusitD2 series, guests are treated to a wealth of upscale facilities that make the most of sweeping city views.

The hotel's dining spaces are built with worldly travellers in mind, offering Mexican cuisine at the poolside Bebidas, freshly baked pastries and international fare at Dusit Gourmet and rooftop cocktails, American diner favourites and after-hours fun at Mimi's. For moments of treasured tranquillity, savour skyline views in the 16th-floor infinity pool before retreating to your plush room.

dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok relishes in local connections and can arrange temple, gallery, art and food tours that sample the city's most vibrant locations. Discover the city as it was 80 years ago at the Bangkokian Museum, embrace the majesty of The Temple of the Emerald Buddha and witness street art in Talad Noi, all nearby.
offer_address: 333 Si Phraya Road, Si Phraya, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Five-Star Bangkok Riverside Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Club Access with Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Soak up the hum of one of the world’s most vibrant cities at the Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok, situated on the east bank of the mighty Chao Phraya River. The ultimate base to explore the culture and history of Bangkok, the hotel has gained a five-star reputation for its luxury service and world-class amenities. Relax in the Chatrium Club Lounge, dine in one of the hotel's six excellent restaurants, enjoy a drink at one of the bars or unwind by the riverside pool as you take in gorgeous views.

Immerse yourself in the city that never sleeps, sampling a unique mix of high-end boutiques and traditional floating markets, towering skyscrapers and gilded temples, world-class dining and mouthwatering street food. Check out the city's renowned mega malls: Siam Paragon, Central World and MBK Center - a shopping haven with over 2,000 boutiques. At the end of long days of discovery, your luxurious hotel awaits, a welcome centre of calm away from the bustling Bangkok streets.
offer_address: 28 Charoen Krung Rd, Wat Phraya Krai, Bang Kho Laem, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Sky-High Banyan Tree Luxury in the Heart of Bangkok with Award-Winning Rooftop Bar & Club Access
description:
Fall in love with Bangkok’s thriving CBD and enjoy a five-star stay at Banyan Tree Bangkok, a sky-high urban oasis and the perfect base to discover the city's bright lights, world-class shopping and diverse culture with absolute ease. Sip martinis at the lauded onsite rooftop Moon Bar, offering unrivalled views across the striking city skyline, and embark on a culinary journey across seven onsite restaurants offering expertly prepared dishes, from Thai classics to Japanese fare. It's effortless luxury for the discerning traveller looking to truly experience everything Bangkok has to offer.

Housed in one of Asia’s tallest buildings and ranked in the top 1% of hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor, Banyan Tree Bangkok is just a short drive away from some of Bangkok's most popular sights, including crimson Buddhist temple Wat Pathum Wanaram, Lumphini Park and Pratu Nam ferry wharf, where you can explore the city like a local via water taxi.
offer_address: 21/100 South Sathon Road, Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

description: Soak up the electric atmosphere of Bangkok staying in the city’s hottest neighbourhood at the five-star Akyra Thonglor Bangkok. title: Sky-High Bangkok Sukhumvit Sanctuary with Rooftop Bar, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Found in the vibrant heart of Sukhumvit, this cool and contemporary escape is your home base for exploring Bangkok's energy-soaked streets. Think sleek rooms that give you a breather from the madness, but keep you close enough to dive right back in. Keeping things things laid-back but lively, Radisson Blu Plaza Bangkok is right in the heart of this diverse district's hustle.

After a day of pounding the pavement in the heat, cool off in the outdoor pool or ride the lift up to Brewski, the rooftop bar serving icy craft beers and sky-high vibes. You’ll get knockout views and a front-row seat to Bangkok’s electric skyline.

Staying in? No worries - there’s a spa for some well-earned pampering, a gym for blowing off steam and beds so comfy you’ll melt into them. When it's time to explore once more, you're minutes from Sukhumvit's mega-malls, sizzling street eats and wild markets, plus the BTS Skytrain is on your doorstep.
offer_address: 489 Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Riverside Bangkok Escape with Daily Club Lounge Access & Cocktails
description:
Experience five-star luxury at the Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok - the perfect Thai escape set on the east bank of the mighty Chao Phraya River. Feel the pulse of one of the liveliest cities in the world with an unforgettable stay that includes daily breakfast, a two-course set menu dining experience, complimentary daily soft drinks in your minibar and exclusive access to the Chatrium Club Lounge including all-day soft drinks and snacks, nightly cocktails and canapés, a daily laundry service and more.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free in existing bedding (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 28 Soi Charoen Krung 70, Wat Phraya Krai, Bang Kho Laem, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Five-Star Anantara Bangkok Riverside Jungle Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails & Cruise Upgrades Available
description:
Discover Bangkok from a new angle with a stay at the five-star Anantara Riverside Bangkok Resort, perfectly placed on the serene banks of the Chao Phraya River. With Thailand’s shining capital on the horizon and the jungle by your side, it’s never been easier to discover Bangkok’s best - the hotel’s complimentary shuttle ferry service means you’re just a short hop from high-end shopping malls, ancient temples and vibrant marketplaces. Return to signature Anantara hospitality steeped in an old-world Siam spirit and 10 extraordinary restaurants and bars, including international teppanyaki house Benihana, historic house of tiki tipples Trader Vic’s and waterfront Longtail by the River, the perfect place to kick back and watch the world drift lazily by.

With a rotating schedule of authentic experiences, including Buddhist ceremonies, longtail boat tours, yoga workshops and city tours, Anantara Riverside Bangkok Resort is brimming with fresh discoveries. Surrounded by 11 acres of lush greenery, this riverside oasis offers the rarest of Bangkok treasures - peace, privacy and undisturbed quiet. Make the most of it by lazing by the magnificent central pool or sample Anantara Spa’s massive menu of wellness treatments, ranging from Himalayan thermal salt therapy to traditional Thai massages.
offer_address: 257/1-3 Charoennakorn Road, Thonburi, Bangkok 10600, Thailand

title: Bangkok Kempinski Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails, Club Lounge Access & Wellness Experiences
description:
Discover a slice of leafy serenity in the middle of Sindhorn Village, Bangkok's upscale lifestyle complex. Kempinski is synonymous with luxury, and this is no exception, with stunning wellness facilities, lavishly spacious rooms and suites and culinary creations worth writing home about. Six exquisite restaurants and bars are guaranteed to set your tastebuds into a frenzy - whether it's classic cocktails at Firefly Bar or Japanese cuisine at Ki Izakaya, delicate pastries from the onsite delicatessen or delicious Thai and Levantine flavours at Flourish.

Wellness is at the forefront, with an entire floor dedicated to Sindhorn Wellness by Resense, home to an infinity pool with stunning views of the sunlit city, a luxury day spa with hydrotherapy baths and a fitness centre. When you're not making good use of Sindhorn Kempinski Hotel Bangkok's facilities, head out to explore the quiet, leafy grounds of the nearby Lumphini Park. This botanical oasis is the perfect place to soak in the skyline before strolling to Velaa Sindhorn Village for dinner, shopping and drinks.
offer_address: 80 Soi Ton Son, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, 10330, Bangkok, Thailand

title: Award-Winning Sky-High Bangkok Luxury with Club Access & Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Experience five-star luxury perched high above the pulsing streets of Bangkok at Tower Club at Lebua. Enter a world of elegance at this multi-award-winning hotel, home to two Michelin-starred restaurants as well as the world’s highest gin, caviar and vodka bar.

Feel the pulse of the city with a high-end urban escape which includes access to the Tower Club Lounge with daily continental breakfast, light lunch buffet and daily afternoon high tea with sweet and savoury treats, world-class canapés and unlimited alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages from 6am until 6pm. Plus, indulge in a signature cocktail per adult at the breathtaking Sky Bar.
offer_address: 1055 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Iconic Sofitel Stay with Exclusive Club Privileges YIDU
description: Experience a celebrity-style getaway at SO Sofitel Bangkok with exclusive Club Signature Lounge access. Spectacularly located on the 25th floor with views over Bangkok, this peaceful oasis above the city is where you can indulge in daily afternoon tea, evening cocktails, all-day refreshments and more. Your escape also includes daily buffet breakfast, a blissful 30-minute massage and late 2pm checkout (subject to availability).
offer_address: 2 N Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

title: Bangkok Opulence with Rooftop Cocktails, Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Access
description:
Soak up Bangkok's electric atmosphere while experiencing the epitome of style with a glamorous stay at a centrally located, five-star haven. Let the hotel’s 1920s-inspired decor sweep you away, especially at the jewel in the hotel’s crown: the prohibition-themed Speakeasy Rooftop Bar, which serves up a gastronomic adventure as the sun sets over the sprawling metropolis.

Indulge in the hotel’s high-class facilities, from the fully-equipped gym and sparkling pool boasting panoramic views, to four exciting restaurants and bars, including a high-end steakhouse overlooking the sparkling city lights. 

From a central Langsuan location, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore Siam, Sukhumvit and Silom - all within easy reach.
offer_address: 55/555 Langsuan Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Five-Star Sky-High Luxury in the Heart of Bangkok with Award-Winning Rooftop Bar & Club Access
description:
Feel the pulse of Bangkok’s thriving CBD with a five-star stay at Banyan Tree Bangkok, ranked in the top 1% of rooftop hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor.

Housed in one of Asia’s tallest buildings, you are a stroll away from some of Bangkok's most popular sights, including Buddhist temple Wat Pathum Wanaram, Lumphini Park and Pratu Nam ferry wharf - where you can explore Bangkok like a local via water taxi. This urban oasis offers luxurious accommodation that allows you to discover the city's bright lights, world-class shopping and diverse culture with absolute ease. Onsite, a must-see is the awarded rooftop Moon Bar, offering unrivalled views across the striking city skyline. Plus, seven onsite restaurants promise expertly prepared dishes, from Thai classics to Japanese fare.
offer_address: 21/100 South Sathon Road, Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Multi-Award-Winning Bangkok Luxury with Daily Dining & Tower Club Lounge Access with All-Day Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Experience the best Bangkok has to offer at the multiple award-winning five-star Tower Club at Lebua, home to the two-Michelin-star restaurant, Mezzaluna, the iconic rooftop bar Sky Bar, and the world's tallest gin, caviar and vodka bar.

Named the World's Leading Luxury Suites Hotel and Asia’s Leading Luxury All Suite Hotel at the World Travel Awards 2021, the hotel also has an enviable position between the 51st and the 59th floors of State Tower - Thailand’s third tallest building. Facilities include an open-air swimming pool with soaring views over the City of Angels, while a fully-equipped gym is the perfect place to maintain your workout regime. When you’re ready to be treated like royalty, head Café Mozu (on the M floor) and the outdoor pool area to enjoy Tower Club Lounge perks including daily dining, and free-flowing drinks every day (6am - 6pm). If you can drag yourself away, you're only a 15-minute drive to some of Bangkok’s must-see sights, including Wat Arun riverside temple, the buzzing Chatuchak Weekend Market, and the Royal Grand Palace.
offer_address: 1055 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Luxurious Central Bangkok Oasis with Daily Executive Lounge Access, Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover a luxury hotel with an iconic design in an unrivalled location when you stay at Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel. Expect lavish decor, from crystal-chandeliered ceilings to hand-painted silk murals and impeccably kept gardens. High-end facilities include 10 exquisite restaurants, a tranquil day spa, swimming pool, hair salon, barber shop, health centre, yoga studio and kids' club. With some of Bangkok's best restaurants, bars and shopping malls just a short stroll away, plus access to the nearby BTS Skytrain connecting you to over 60 stations, a stay at Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel places you at the centre of all the action.

Take your pick from sun-drenched guestrooms and lavish suites, and take refuge from the city's buzzing energy in your own private oasis. When you're ready to leave the comfort of your stylishly appointed room, spend your days basking in the Thai sun by the outdoor pool, indulging in an onsite cooking class at Spice Spoons or recharging with an opulent treatment at Anantara Spa.
offer_address: 155 Ratchadamri Road, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Sky-High Luxury with Club Access at Iconic Banyan Tree Bangkok
description: Experience five-star luxury at the all-suite Banyan Tree Bangkok. One of Asia’s tallest and most iconic hotels, it features 10 bars and restaurants - including the world-famous, newly renovated rooftop Moon Bar - and a chic outdoor pool deck offering views over the striking city skyline. You’ll feel the pulse of one of the liveliest cities in the world with a high-end urban stopover that includes one cocktail each at Moon Bar and exclusive VIP access to the Club Lounge with daily buffet breakfast, nightly happy hour, daily free-flow beer, coffee, tea and snacks, daily laundry or clothes pressing and more. Plus, one child (aged 11 years and under) stay free with Club access included!
offer_address: S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Bangkok City Sanctuary in the Heart of Siam with Rooftop Pool, Club Access & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Experience unrivalled luxury at Chatrium Grand Bangkok, a five-star property that exudes charm and character in the heart of one of the world's most vibrant cities. The ultimate base to explore the culture and history of the Thai capital, the hotel (one of the latest additions to the city) has gained a glowing reputation for its renowned service and world-class amenities. Chatrium Grand Bangkok offers guests an unrivalled central position in the heart of the Siam business district, right near the Siam Center shopping mall. Enjoy a breezy walk to many of Bangkok's countless delights, including The Grand Palace, Lumphini Park and the Saket Temple.

After days of discovery, return to Chatrium Grand Bangkok's perfect fusion of upscale elegance and modern comforts. The hotel’s exquisite dining offerings promise brilliance in abundance - delight with contemporary cuisine in the lively Savio restaurant, savour all-you-can-eat afternoon tea in the refined Lobby Lounge or drink in spectacular city views from the light-filled Flow pool lounge. Round out the day with a tranquil spa treatment at the soothing THANN wellness sanctuary or with a dip in the oasis-style pool.
offer_address: 728 Phetchaburi Road, Khwaeng Thanon Phetchaburi, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Best-Selling Bangkok Luxury is Back: Enjoy Nightly Free-Flow Drinks in the M Club Lounge, Plus Two Kids Stay Free
description: Soak up the electric atmosphere of Bangkok, staying in five-star luxury at Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen’s Park - perfectly positioned to enjoy the city’s shopping, dining and nightlife. Access exclusive M Club Lounge privileges including daily breakfast, nightly free-flow drinks and canapes and much more, and a welcome drink each at the hotel’s spectacular ABar Rooftop boasting panoramic views across the city skyline - plus, two kids 11 years and under stay free.
location_description: Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen’s Park - Jan 19
offer_address: 199 Sukhumvit Soi 22 Klong Ton, Klong Toey Klong Toey Bangkok, 10, 10110, Thailand

title: Bangkok Blue Elephant Thai Cooking Class with Lunch & Take-Home Gift
description:
Master the art of Thai cuisine with a half-day cooking class at Blue Elephant Cooking School Bangkok. Follow your expert chef as they guide you step-by-step through four mouthwatering, authentic Thai dishes to create your own four-course meal comprised of a starter, soup, main dish and an accompanying dish. 

Whether you’re a fan of fresh papaya salad, a fragrant green curry with melt-in-your-mouth chicken, silky coconut milk soup with prawns or a classic Pad Thai, you’ll be dealt the tools and skills to recreate these globally loved dishes at home. If you choose a morning class, you’ll gather local ingredients fresh from the market soon after you arrive. Then, prepare to cook up a storm and perfect culinary techniques unique to Thai cuisine. The best part? You can enjoy the fruits of your labour with a lunchtime feast.
offer_address: BTS station, 233 S Sathon Rd, Yan Nawa Sathon, Surasak, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Ultra-Luxe Spacious Suites in the Heart of Bangkok with Daily Breakfast & Lounge Access
description:
Find yourself in the heart of Thailand's bustling capital with a luxurious stay at Cape House Langsuan, where convenience doesn't mean compromising on style. Beautifully appointed suites feature spacious living areas, kitchen facilities and plush bedding. After a shopping spree at Siam Square - about a 20-minute stroll away -  escape the heat with a plunge in the outdoor pool. Feel your stresses soak away in the steam room and sauna or treat yourself at the hotel's renowned Italian restaurant, No.43 Italian Bistro.

The city's top attractions are within easy reach; picturesque Lumphini Park is around a 15-minute walk, while the BTS subway network is a convenient five-minute stroll from your front door. Fancy a big night on the town? Hop in a taxi, and in less than 20 minutes you'll be among the vibrant bars and restaurants of Khao San Road.
offer_address: 43 Soi Langsuan, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan District, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Tropical Wellness Retreat with Club Access in the Heart of Bangkok
description: Make Mövenpick BDMS Wellness Resort Bangkok your inner-city oasis in Thailand’s vibrant capital. Spend your days exploring the attractions and restaurants on your doorstep, then return to this blissful retreat that places an emphasis on wellbeing with fresh, healthy cuisine, the adjoining BDMS Wellness Clinic, offering a brand-new fitness centre, and wellbeing-oriented rooms with yoga mats. Of course, in true Mövenpick style, there's also a daily chocolate hour and their famous ice cream for those who fancy a naughty-but-nice treat! Enjoy daily breakfast, one incredible dining experience and exclusive access to the Club Lounge, offering a nightly open bar with beer, wine and spirits, afternoon snacks, all-day non-alcoholic refreshments and the option to enjoy breakfast in the lounge.
offer_address: 2 Witthayu Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Khet Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails, Club Lounge Access & Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Experience unmatched luxury at this urban oasis, offering an exceptional blend of first-class service, exceptional dining and spectacular views over Bangkok. From the moment you step inside, you’ll be enveloped in elegance - spend your days lazing by the rooftop infinity pool and bar, where panoramic views of the city skyline set the perfect scene, or head to VIE Spa to experience Thai wellness at its absolute finest.

The dining at VIE Hotel Bangkok - MGallery is unrivalled. Embark on a culinary oddyssey at house of refined French cuisine Signature (one Michelin star), exceptional omakase spot YTSB - Yellow Tail Sushi Bar or head to La VIE Bistronomy for fiery Thai flavours and beloved international classics.

Venture beyond the hotel to explore Bangkok’s vibrant cultural gems, from the historic Grand Palace to the peaceful Lumphini Park. After a day of discovery, return to the hotel and unwind at the chic Piano Bar, sipping handcrafted cocktails and enjoying delicious canapes before your night begins.
offer_address: 117 39 40, Phaya Thai Road, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Sophisticated Five-Star SO/ Bangkok Stay with Club Signature Access & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Spoil your senses with a sublime stay at SO/ Bangkok - an outrageously fashionable sanctuary located in Bangkok's lively entertainment district. Part of the sophisticated, fashion-led SO/ Hotels & Resorts, this tranquil hideaway radiates contemporary cool and has mastered the art of theatricality. Designed by legendary couturier Christian Lacroix, the hotel oozes French elegance, with fantasy and folklore elements seamlessly integrated throughout, from modernist retrofitted furniture and eclectic wallpapers to playful staff uniforms.

Between bouts of exploring the city, Club Signature is the perfect spot to indulge in spectacular city views. Take a dip in the stunning rooftop infinity pool, which looks out onto leafy Lumphini Park, stay active in the state-of-the-art SO/ FIT gym and pamper yourself at the tranquil SO/ SPA, rated best spa in Bangkok by Tripadvisor. Known for awe-inspiring ancient temples, buzzing nightlife, and tempting street food, Bangkok is a unique urban centre that should be on every bucket list - and SO/ Bangkok ensures you do it all in style.
offer_address: 2 North Sathon Road, Si Lom, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Stylish Bangkok CBD Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Two Onsite Restaurants
description:
Feel the pulse of the Thai capital with a stay at this urban sanctuary, ideally situated mere steps from the Queen Sirikit MRT Station. This retreat serves as the perfect launchpad to explore Bangkok's bustling street markets, shopping malls, grand temples and vibrant dining scene.

Soak up the views from the hotel's floor-to-ceiling windows, work up a sweat at the fully-equipped gym, relish Thai and Western cuisine inspired by local produce at Bistro@M Restaurant and wind down with a tipple at the Coffee & Cider Bar. Be it business or leisure, this tastefully appointed property has everything you need to elevate your Bangkok experience.
offer_address: FYI Center, 2527 Rama IV Road, Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Five-Star Sky-High Bangkok Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Embrace endless opulence in the buzzing, surprise-filled heart of Thailand’s capital with a stay at the five-star 137 Pillars Suites & Residences Bangkok. Each sleek, masterfully appointed suite and residence boasts a private balcony and dazzling skyline views of the shining city below, and the hotel’s central location makes exploring the city’s wealth of museums, world-class dining venues and high-end shopping boutiques a breeze. With four sumptuous restaurants and bars, a world-class onsite spa, a soaring 27th-floor infinity pool and a personalised butler service, it’s the perfect choice for the sophisticated traveller seeking Bangkok’s very best.

137 Pillars Suites & Residences is a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, committed to excellence and guaranteed to impress. Have an unforgettable Bangkok stay with a range of cultural experiences, including the hotel’s own unique private art tour, or a visit to the Queen Sirikit Silk Museum.
offer_address: 59/1 Soi Sukhumvit 39, Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Glamorous Bangkok Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Feel the pulse of Bangkok from this sophisticated five-star urban sanctuary, ideally placed in the heart of the city's vibrant Surawong district. Savour authentic Thai and Chinese flavours at Ruenton Restaurant, famed for its signature Hainanese chicken rice, or explore the nearby local street food stalls.

After a day of discovery, unwind with a refreshing dip in the hotel’s inviting outdoor pool. Enjoy a decadent daytime meal at Phar-Ram IV Bistro, offering refined French cuisine and transforming into a chic wine bar by night. For a tranquil evening, sip a drink at the Garden Lounge before retreating to your stylish room for a restful night’s sleep.
offer_address: 54 Surawong Road, Silom Bangr Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Contemporary Downtown Bangkok Escape with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Cocktail & THB500 Dining Credit
description:
Enjoy the best of Thailand’s capital city with a central downtown stay just a stone's throw from the city's bustling Sukhumvit Road. This stylish New York-inspired hotel is a welcome escape amid the city's lively street markets, thriving shopping malls and fabulous dining venues. Just a short stroll away, you'll find the lively Terminal 21 Shopping Mall and the tranquil Benjakitti Park.

Within the hotel, unwind in the shimmering outdoor pool or indulge in various cuisines at the three onsite restaurants, each named after iconic New York attractions: 5th Avenue, The Bronx Bar & Cafe and the Broadway Diner.
offer_address: 13 Sukhumvit Soi 15, Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoey Nua, Wattana 10110, Bangkok, Thailand

title: Sophisticated Bangkok Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Cocktails & Onsite Spa
description:
Discover five-star luxury at one of Bangkok's most lavish hotels, surrounded by gilded temples, floating markets, and world-class dining in Thailand's capital. With architecture inspired by the riverside location, expect a mix of traditional Thai design with modern details and spectacular facilities.

Feel like royalty floating down the River of Kings on a romantic sunset cruise (surcharges apply) to the ancient Temple of Dawn, best enjoyed with a handcrafted cocktail in hand. Pamper yourself at The Peninsula Spa with traditional massages or enjoy an intimate dinner at The River Café & Terrace.

Visit the city’s many historic temples to learn more about Thai tradition, glittering with awe-inspiring architecture and intricate statues covered in gold. It wouldn’t be a Thai vacation without exploring the bustling markets, filled with vibrant colours, noise, and an assortment of fragrant foods and goods you'll want to stow away in your suitcase.
offer_address: 333 Charoen Nakhon Road, Khlong San, Bangkok 10600, Thailand

title: Best-Selling Bangkok with Nightly Free-Flow Drinks - Two Kids Stay Free
description:

description: An incomparable city escape drenched in luxury awaits at The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok. Inspired by Thai culture, this retreat adds a modern touch to the authentic beauty of Bangkok. Indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at Athenee Spa and dine from a selection of international restaurants, including Kintsugi Bangkok by Jeff Ramsey for elegant Japanese or The Silk Road for classic Cantonese.

title: Grand Reopening: Sophisticated Sofitel Bangkok Stay with Daily Breakfast & Executive Club Lounge Access
description:
Refreshed and ready for guests, Sofitel Bangkok Sukhumvit has reopened its doors in the heart of Thailand’s buzzing capital. Fusing contemporary style and a French-chic ambience with lavish amenities and high-end dining venues, Sofitel Bangkok Sukhumvit provides a five-star city sanctuary directly above the hustle and bustle of Sukhumvit Road. One of the four incredible eateries is Belga Rooftop Bar & Brasserie, located on the 32nd floor. The first Belgian rooftop restaurant to hit the streets of Bangkok, this space not only boasts spectacular views of the sparkling skyline but also culinary greatness and a thriving ambiance.

Throughout your stay, indulge with exclusive access to Club Millésime and all its benefits as you discover the allure of this vibrant city. Relax as you please in the Le Spa with L'Occitane, sauna or hydrobath, and fill your days tasting your way through cocktails across three bars and succulent meals at the scrumptious restaurants.
offer_address: 189 Sukhumvit Road, Soi 13-15, Klongtoey Nua Wattana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

description:

description:
Discover pure indulgence at this Mövenpick resort, where five-star luxury merges with a tranquil escape in the heart of the city. This sprawling oasis is a haven of relaxation, set amongst tropical gardens that offer a blissful retreat away from bustling Bangkok. 

With thoughtfully designed rooms and signature wellness facilities, this is your personal sanctuary for rest and rejuvenation.

Enjoy gourmet cuisine at one of the resort's four dining venues, from tantalising international fare at Nourish to local delicacies at Khum Hom. Be sure to visit Bittersweet bar for expertly crafted cocktails and treat yourself to Mövenpick’s famous Chocolate Hour, a true feast for the senses.

Don't forget to make use of the BDMS Wellness Clinic, before unwinding at Be Well Spa.

description:
Make your stay amid Bangkok’s vibrant city streets a memorable one at Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok, an artsy hotel ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide by Tripadvisor in 2021. The hotel boasts a superb central location surrounded by some of the city’s best shops and restaurants. Must-visit sights are close by, including BTS National Stadium, Jim Thompson House, glittering shopping malls and historic temples.

Along with eye-catching décor and unique artwork, the hotel offers fabulous facilities, creating an oasis amid the thrum of the city. Head up to the rooftop bar and order a Mai Thai while looking out over the city skyline, take a dip in the 11th-floor infinity pool flanked by rows of sun loungers and dine in the art gallery-inspired Chim Chim restaurant.

Wander to Victory Monument just down the road and mingle with the locals to get an understanding of how this fabulous city works, then, take a break from the neon lights and settle in for a day of complete relaxation by the hotel's lagoon-style pool and lush garden, with a good book in one hand and a cocktail in the other.

Six distinctive restaurants and bars promise to thrill your palate, whether it’s craft cocktails at Firefly Bar, artful Japanese plates at Ki Izakaya, handmade pastries from Berthold Delikatessen or vibrant Thai and Levantine dishes at Flourish.

Wellness is central to the experience, with an entire floor dedicated to Sindhorn Wellness by Resense. Here, you’ll find an infinity pool overlooking the city, a lavish day spa with hydrotherapy baths, and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Beyond the hotel, take a leisurely stroll through Lumphini Park’s lush, peaceful grounds - a rare botanical haven in the city. This glittering high-rise beside the water enjoys a prime location with direct access to the SkyTrain, public ferry terminal and bus links, making it easy to discover everything this vibrant cosmopolitan city has to offer. After busy days exploring, return to renowned Shangri-La luxury, where world-class restaurants and dining, a chocolate boutique, and the dreamy CHI, The Spa await to relax and rejuvenate you.

Sightseeing is almost too easy in Bangkok, as you can easily reach the city’s best attractions from the Saphan Taksin BTS or take the scenic option and hop onboard the shuttle boats that sail along the idyllic Chao Phraya River. Immerse yourself in the city that never sleeps, sampling its vibrant nightlife, historic temples and delicious cuisine, from street food to fine dining. Feel the buzz of one of the world’s most vibrant cities at the Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok, situated on the east bank of the mighty Chao Phraya River. Relax in the Chatrium Club Lounge, dine in one of the hotel's two excellent restaurants, enjoy a drink at one of the bars or unwind by the riverside pool as you take in gorgeous views.

Stroll Asiatique’s waterfront promenade nearby, boasting four districts offering spectacular cultural performances, trendy boutiques and mouthwatering dining destinations. Discover everything you might need on your doorstep, with easy access to downtown and the Asoke BTS Skytrain and MRT Sukhumvit subway from the hotel - perfect for both those discovering the city for the first time and return visitors.

Blessed with an enviable position between the 51st and the 59th floors of State Tower - Thailand’s third tallest building - this luxe property features open-air swimming pool with soaring views over the glittering city and a fully-equipped gym, the perfect place to maintain your workout regime.

When you’re ready to be treated like royalty, head to Café Mozu (on the M floor) for a culinary journey around the world, or visit the Tower Club Lounge to enjoy perks including daily dining and free-flowing daily drinks (6am - 6pm) alongside panoramic Bangkok views. Pamper yourself at The Peninsula Spa with traditional massages or enjoy an intimate dinner at The River Café & Terrace.

Bangkok’s electric atmosphere draws in crowds of visitors looking to get lost in a cacophony of lights, sounds and incredible sights. Visit the city’s many historic temples to learn more about Thai tradition, glittering with awe-inspiring architecture and intricate statues covered in gold. It wouldn’t be a Thai vacation without an exploration of the bustling markets, filled with vibrant colours, noise, and an assortment of fragrant foods and curious goods you'll want to stow away in your suitcase.
