title: Five-Star Bangkok Stopover with Executive Lounge Access
description: Discover Thailand's vibrant capital with a five-star stopover at the luxurious Anantara Siam Bangkok - an elegant retreat located in one of the city’s most sought-after locations, complete with ten dining outlets, a beautiful outdoor swimming pool and more. Stay for four days/three nights with Executive Lounge access - including over five hours of unlimited cocktails every evening, plus daily buffet breakfasts, nightly canapes, snacks and refreshments all day long - and more for only $699 for two adults, valued up to $1,486.
offer_address: 155 Ratchadamri Rd, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Bangkok Resort-Style City Break with Pool, Kids' Club & Onsite Dining
description:
Discover an urban sanctuary at this resort-style hotel, nestled in the vibrant heart of Bangkok. Perfect for families, this property boasts a stunning pool with a waterslide, alongside a playroom, games room and kids' club. Long-stay guests will love the spacious rooms and suites, each thoughtfully designed with stylish living and dining areas for the ultimate comfort.

Savour tasty delicacies at the El Santo restaurant, or sip on exquisite cocktails at the Sips & Splash poolside bar. With its prime location near Phrom Phong BTS Skytrain Station, you’ll enjoy seamless access to Bangkok’s cultural gems, shopping havens and buzzing entertainment spots. There is even a rooftop tennis court where you can play a game of tennis surrounding by the towering skyscrapers of this colourful city.
offer_address: 12-14 Sukhumvit 29 Alley, Klong Toey Nua, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Blissful Bangkok Riverside Resort with 10 Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: The buzzingly busy streets of Bangkok seem miles away when you stay at Anantara Riverside Bangkok Resort, thanks to its tranquil location on the banks of Chao Phraya River, surrounded by acres of lush jungle. Ten onsite dining venues are sure to delight any gourmand: feast on teppanyaki, dine on mouthwatering Italian cuisine and sip cocktails poolside. Each day is a new adventure, with river cruises, yoga classes, a tennis court and the deluxe Anantara Spa.
offer_address: 257/1-3 Charoennakorn Road, Thonburi, Bangkok, 10600, Thailand

title: Opulent Bangkok Riverside Escape with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Infinity Pool
description: Luxury in all forms roams free at The Siam Hotel, an exquisite oasis in the heart of Bangkok. Hideaway in one of the hotel's impeccably styled private sanctuaries, or explore the breathtaking infinity pool, tranquil gardens, or art and antique-filled interiors set against the flowing Chao Phraya River. Indulge in a traditional Thai feast at one of the hotel’s world-class restaurants, or enjoy a perfectly curated cocktail while stretching out on a plush sun lounge on the pristine lawn.
offer_address: The Siam 3, 2 Thanon Khao, Vachirapayabal, Dusit District, Bangkok 10300, Thailand

title: Bangkok Mövenpick Luxury with Rooftop Pool & Rainforest Bar
description:
Retreat to one of Bangkok's trendiest neighbourhoods with a signature Mövenpick stay. Eat at the all-day dining hub, Lelawadee Restaurant, or elevate your experience with a refreshing cocktail at the Rainforest Rooftop Bar with panoramic city vistas and a unique two-story waterfall.

Enjoy the hotel’s stylish surroundings with a dip in the picturesque rooftop pool, relax in the manicured courtyard or rest up in beautifully appointed rooms; all welcome havens of calm and tranquillity high above the thrilling energy of the city.
offer_address: 47 Sukhumvit Soi 15 Sukhumvit Road Klong Toei Nuea Wattana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Five-Star Sky-High Luxury in the Heart of Bangkok with Award-Winning Rooftop Bar
description: Feel the pulse of Bangkok’s thriving CBD with a five-star stay at Banyan Tree Bangkok, ranked one of the top 25 rooftop hotels in the world on Tripadvisor. Housed in one of Asia’s tallest buildings, you are a stroll away from some of Bangkok's most popular sights, including Buddhist temple Wat Pathum Wanaram, Lumphini Park and Pratu Nam ferry wharf - where you can explore Bangkok like a local via water taxi. This urban oasis offers luxurious accommodation that allows you to discover the city's bright lights, world-class shopping, and diverse culture with absolute ease. Onsite, a must-see is the awarded rooftop Moon Bar, offering unrivalled views across the striking city skyline. Plus, seven onsite restaurants promise expertly prepared dishes, from Thai classics to Japanese fare.
offer_address: 21/100 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Sophisticated High-Rise Bangkok Elegance Above Renowned Mall with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Spa
description:
Enjoy a stylish stay in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise. A world of comfort, style, and convenience awaits at this haven perched in the Bangkok skyline, above the famed Platinum Shopping Mall. With CentralWorld, Siam Paragon, and Big C just a short stroll away, and the BTS Skytrain within easy reach, your Bangkok adventure is at our doorstep.

Unwind with breathtaking city views, take a refreshing dip in the infinity pool and sip handcrafted cocktails at the rooftop bar. Indulge in a global culinary journey with flavours from Thailand, Japan, India, and beyond with an international buffet at The Square Restaurant. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the bustling Pratunam Market or savour the flavours of Thailand at the nearby street food stalls. On your return, embrace Let's Relax Spa to recharge your mind, body and soul.
offer_address: 220 Petchaburi Road Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Stylish Bangkok City Escape on Wireless Road with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description: Surrounded by verdant rain trees, prestigious embassies and Thailand's indelible heritage, Hotel Indigo Bangkok Wireless Road is the perfect place to discover the very best of the capital - whether it’s sizzling street food or soulful walks through nearby Lumphini Park. Savour sky-high, smoke-fuelled plates at CHAR Restaurant, cozy craft beers at 22 Steps Craft House or simply laze by the hotel’s mirage-like rooftop pool, surrounded by Bangkok’s soaring skyline.
offer_address: 81 Witthayu Rd, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Cosmopolitan Bangkok Retreat in Heart of Silom with Outdoor Pool
description: Embrace a contemporary city escape with a stay at Holiday Inn Bangkok Silom, an IHG Hotel, and launch into the restaurants, bars and night markets speckled in this frenetic city. After you’ve discovered the city known as the ‘Wall Street of Thailand,’ take your tastebuds on a journey of the world at The Brasserie, snack on comfort food at the elegant Orchid Lounge or sample a Thai-inspired cocktail by the outdoor pool.
location_description: Holiday Inn Bangkok Silom, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 981 Silom Road, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Luxury Five-Star Escape in the Heart of Bangkok
description: Discover the best of Bangkok's vibrant CBD with a five-star stay at InterContinental Bangkok, an IHG Hotel. Within an easy walk of Chit Lom BTS Station and Pratunam Pier, explore Bangkok like a true local - head to nearby Central World for high-end shopping in Bangkok's largest mall or Wat Benchamabophit to witness Buddhist icons surrounded by elegant Italian marble or ascend to the hotel's luxurious rooftop pool for glorious views of the city beyond.
offer_address: 973 Phloen Chit Rd, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Sky-High Oasis near BTS Skytrain with Onsite Dining & Outdoor Pool
description:
Smack dab in the thriving heart of Sukhumvit Road, Hyatt Regency Bangkok Sukhumvit is your go-to for sky-high style and top-notch comfort. Whether you're kicking back at Spectrum rooftop bar or gliding through the swimming pool, this place brings serious city vibes with a side of luxury.

Step out the front foor and you're minutes from some of the best eats, shops and nightlife in Bangkok - plus direct BTS access via the skybridge, so you can zip around with ease. With spacious rooms, standout dining at five venues and a 24-hour fitness centre, everything you need is at your fingertips.
offer_address: BTS Nana, 1 Sukhumvit Soi 13, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Contemporary Pullman Bangkok Escape with Six Restaurants, Infinity Pool & Luxe Spa
description:
Find yourself in the heart of it all from this contemporary Pullman sanctuary, perfectly poised in the heart of Bangkok, within easy rich of the Thai capital city's most happening districts. Retreat to the hotel's plush, well-appointed rooms, swim laps in Bangkok's largest infinity pool or indulge in soothing treatments at Le Spa - this urban oasis has it all to create a memorable escape.

If you're feeling peckish, take delight across the hotel's six restaurants and bars: sample world-class Japanese meals at Tenshino, relish traditional omakase dining at Tenko, feast on Thai delicacies at Cuisine Unplugged and sip on signature cocktails at Glen Bar and Pool Bar. Being mere steps from the Skytrain station, the city's best attractions are easily accessible, plus, you can shop until you drop at the nearby King Power Duty-Free Complex and Siam Square One.
offer_address: 8, 2 Rang Nam Alley, Khwaeng Thanon Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Tantalising Bangkok City Stay in the Heart of the Entertainment District
description: In the heart of Bangkok's world-class entertainment, business and shopping district lies the Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Sathorn, an IHG Hotel. Take the time to energise at the fitness centre and enjoy a daily Express Start breakfast before delving into the vibrant markets of Chinatown and strolling the majestic grounds of the Grand Palace. End the day gazing out over the never-ending cityscape while indulging in a smooth scotch from nearby MahaNakhon Bangkok SkyBar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Sathorn, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 51 Soi Pipat, Silom, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Five-Star Bangkok Riverside Haven with 11 Outstanding Restaurants & Bars
description:
Standing tall alongside the famed Chao Phraya River is the exceptionally stylish, five-star Mandarin Oriental Bangkok. With 11 restaurants and bars onsite, you won't need to venture far to unearth culinary wonders. Take a seat at the two-Michelin-starred restaurant, Le Normandie by Alain Rouxor, drop into Lord Jim's for mouthwatering seafood and prime cuts of meat, or head to The Author's Lounge and the Bamboo Bar for creative cocktails. When you need a moment of bliss, The Oriental Spa is the place to go for luxurious treatments inspired by traditional Thai and western techniques. 

Beyond this luxe property lies some of Bangkok's best attractions, including the Grand Palace just a short boat ride away, or the renowned IconSiam shopping precinct.
offer_address: 48 Oriental Ave, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Bangkok Sukhumvit Soi 11 Stay Near Malls and Nightlife
description: In the heart of the popular Sukhumvit Soi 11 district, Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Sukhumvit 11, an IHG Hotel is your dazzling gateway to this Bangkok entertainment strip. Start your day with an Express Start Breakfast and an energising visit to the rooftop fitness centre with sweeping city views before adventuring out to experience this happening strip, famous for hawker stalls and mouthwatering street food, trendy shopping malls, boutiques and energetic nightlife.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Sukhumvit 11, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 30 Sukhumvit Soi 11, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Grand Opening: Ultra-Cool Bangkok Escape with Rooftop Bar & Pool
description: Bold, innovative and fabulously unconventional, The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon - first opened in July 2022 - stands high above the city, offering an ultra-cool escape in the centre of Thailand’s buzzing capital. With a 24-hour gym, palm-fringed rooftop lagoon and a dazzling all-star lineup of restaurants and bars - including Sky Beach, the highest rooftop bar in the city, international Cantonese darling Mott 32 and the brilliantly eccentric Tease - it's the perfect launchpad to explore everything hip and happening in the heart of Bangkok. With each room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows offering spectacular views of the sprawling cityscape below, it’s a Bangkok escape that’s guaranteed to take you to new heights.
offer_address: 114 Naradhiwas Rajanagarindra Rd, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Stylish Bangkok Urban Escape near Siam SkyTrain Station with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
description:
Immerse yourself in the contemporary chic spirit of this plush Novotel urban sanctuary, perfectly positioned in the heart of Bangkok's vibrant Siam Square. Take advantage of the hotel's prime location and explore the Thai capital to the fullest with easy access to the Siam SkyTrain station, the world-renowned MBK centre and the high-end Siam Paragon Mall.

Indulge in a feast of flavours at The Square as you relish local Thai delights and sip on signature cocktails at the Gourmet Bar after a day of exploration. For some relaxing moments, go for a swim in the sparkling outdoor pool or pamper yourself with restorative facial and body treatments at the Tammachart Day Spa.
offer_address: 392/44 Siam Square Soi 6 Rama I Road Pathumwan, Bangkok, Thailand, 10330

title: Modern Bangkok City Break with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Argentinian Steakhouse
description:
Experience Bangkok's vibrant city life with a stay at this modern retreat located in the heart of the city's bustling Sukhumvit district. Perfect for those looking for an urban escape, enjoy the best of Bangkok right amongst the action at the Soi 11 shopping and dining strip.

Cool off at the hotel's stylish rooftop pool and savour a poolside cocktail at The Pool Bar before heading to the onsite Lily Fu's for a dinner of Asian favourites or  El Gaucho Argentinian Steakhouse for perfectly grilled steaks on the terrace. For fitness enthusiasts, the hotel's modern gym facilities provide the perfect space to maintain your routine.
offer_address: 18 Sukhumvit Soi 11, Nana, Khlongtoey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Bangkok Five-Star Riverside Luxurious Urban Oasis
description:
Dramatically poised on the shimmering shoreline of the Chao Phraya River, flanked by the beautiful palaces, sacred temples and fascinating monuments of Bangkok, The Siam Hotel offers private five-star urban luxury as the wonders of Thailand unfurl before you. Located in the leafy Dusit district, the city's European-influenced political hub, vibrant shopping and fine produce at the nearby Bobae Market beckon, or check out the renowned hole-in-the-wall eateries concealed in the narrow sidestreets.

Enjoy escapism at this urban sanctuary, replete with exquisite art, remarkable antiques, and spacious suites and picture-perfect villas intimate by design, set amidst three acres of lush gardens - a luxuriously serene escape from Bangkok. Come for the seclusion, and stay for the restorative wellness options, spa, infinity pool and gymnasium. For those wanting to immortalise their stay, why not receive a sacred tattoo at the Sak Yant Tattoo Studio. When hungry, sharpen your appetite with bold, authentic flavours at the onsite Chon Thai Restaurant. Served riverside, indulge in irresistible, home-cooked Thai cuisine infused with the finest local produce and rich traditional history. For something more casual, Café Cha is ideal for those looking for a critical caffeine hit or something sweet in the afternoon. An oasis of luxury, this breathtaking resort ensures every moment will be one to remember.
offer_address: The Siam 3, 2 Thanon Khao, Vachirapayabal, Dusit District, Bangkok 10300, Thailand

vendor_name: Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre at CentralWorld
title: Five-Star Central Bangkok Opulence with Rooftop Dining, Pool Bar & Day Spa
description: Relish boundless luxury and traditional Thai hospitality with a stay at Centara Grand at CentralWorld, an opulent hotel towering above the city's bustling CentralWorld shopping complex. Immerse yourself in the city's dynamic energy, with easy access to world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment. Share authentic Chinese-Cantonese dim sum at Dynasty, indulge in vibrant Spanish flavours at UNO MAS or unwind with a refreshing drink at the chic Red Sky Bar, boasting one of the city's best viewpoints. For a touch of tranquillity in the urban buzz, retreat to the hotel's serene spa or take a dip in the stunning outdoor pool.
offer_address: 999/99 Rama 1 Road, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 Thailand

title: Five-Star Bangkok Riverside Escape with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Day Spa
description:
Unrivalled luxury and cosmopolitan joie de vivre await at the illustrious Capella Bangkok, an ultra-luxe sanctuary nestled along the majestic Chao Phraya River. Set in the energetic Charoenkrung district, it's perfectly placed for days meandering through art galleries, iconic marketplaces, and eclectic dining precincts.

Stay within the hotel’s breathtaking bounds to enjoy a wealth of delightful culinary experiences. Indulge in Michelin-starred magic at Cote by Mauro Colagreco, settle in for moreish plates by the water’s edge at Phra Nakhon, or relax with a mood-complementing cocktail in the sparkling confines of Stella. Find a pure sense of tranquillity at the hotel’s world-class day spa, boasting a fully equipped fitness centre and wellness pavilion dedicated to your rejuvenation.
offer_address: 300/2 Charoenkrung Road, Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Contemporary Five-Star Bangkok Retreat with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Mingle with the fashionistas and film stars of vibrant Bangkok with a stay at the sleek COMO Metropolitan Bangkok. Perched on dynamic Sathorn Road in the Lumpini District, this sophisticated sanctuary is both the place to be seen and a tranquil escape, in the middle of the action but offering peaceful and private spaces to relax. Start every morning feeling fresh in minimalist rooms and suites that make luxurious comfort the first priority. Continue the descent into relaxation at COMO Shambhala Spa with a morning yoga class or laps of the outdoor 25-metre pool, before indulging in an hour’s bliss with one of the best Thai massages in Bangkok. Complete your day with a prestigious dining experience at the onsite Michelin-starred Nahm restaurant.
offer_address: 27 South Sathon Road, Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Opulent Bangkok Stylish Escape with Sumptuous Lounge & Infinity Pool
description: Indulge in Thai opulence at the stunning InterContinental Bangkok Sukhumvit, an IHG Hotel. Nestled in vibrant Ratchaprasong, this exquisite retreat offers palatial interiors flowing seamlessly from the plush bar to the elegant dining space. Experience ultimate relaxation with rejuvenating spa treatments, look over the gleeming cityscape while floating along the infinity pool and explore lively Bangkok in style.
location_description: InterContinental Bangkok Sukhumvit, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 10 Soi Sukhumvit 59, Sukhumvit Road Bangkok 10110 Thailand

title: Bangkok Kempinski Five-Star Glamour with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: A slice of serenity in the heart of buzzing Bangkok awaits at the five-star Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok, where signature luxury and an unrivalled location come together. Gourmands can't pass up a chance to stay in and dine: there are three restaurants and bars to choose from, including the award-winning Michelin-starred Sra Bua by Kiin Kiin. The luxury spa and health club is a haven offering treatments like traditional Thai massages and revitalising facials for a dose of rest and relaxation. A covered walkway links this resort-style hotel to the famous Siam Paragon shopping mall, so you're never too far from a spot of top-tier shopping. Meanwhile, the BTS SkyTrain station at Siam is within easy walking distance, bringing Bangkok's sights closer.
offer_address: 991/9 Rama I Rd, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Soi Soonvijai
title: Bangkok Garden-Inspired City Break on Soi Soonvijai
description: Find your slice of serenity in the heart of vibrant Bangkok with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Soi Soonvijai, an IHG Hotel. Positioned within the heart of the city’s thriving wellness and retail district, this garden-filled oasis offers easy access to nearby night markets, upscale shopping malls and the ultra-hip nightlife district Thonglor. Return to the tranquillity of the second-floor Healing Gardens or witness each glorious sunset on the verdant rooftop.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Soi Soonvijai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 19 Soi Soonvijai, New Petchburi Road, Bangkok, 10310 Thailand

title: Contemporary Bangkok Radisson Break
description:
Soak up every second of sensational Bangkok with a stay at Radisson Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit, a luxury hotel just minutes from the heart of the buzzing city centre. Perched in the heart of the Lower Sukhumvit district, this contemporary hotel is just minutes from the famous Sukhumvit thoroughfare and the lively restaurants, bars and clubs that call the area home. Spectacular shopping malls are a 10-minute wander away, as are a number of public transport options, but the hotel’s complimentary tuk-tuk shuttle will get you there even faster.

Despite its central location, Radisson Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit is a peaceful port, with spacious rooms and suites spread over seven storeys. Head to the very top level to laze by the rooftop pool and hot tub, grazing on snacks from Sip & Chill rooftop bar, or work up a sweat at the well-equipped fitness centre. When night falls, make your way to the Michelin-plated Punjab Grill to sample Indian fine dining to a live music soundtrack, before finishing your evening at Asqu lounge with a local beer or carefully crafted cocktail.
offer_address: 23/2 Soi Sukhumvit 13, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Five-Star Bangkok Escape Opposite Leafy Lumpini Park
description: Within walking distance of Si Lom MRT and Sala Daeng BTS stations, Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park, an IHG Hotel, sits opposite Bangkok’s 58-hectare leafy patch of paradise. From the inviting swimming pool and fully-equipped fitness centre to the indulgent spa and expertly prepared Cantonese and international dishes at the lavish onsite restaurants - including Xin Tian Di and Panorama - this hotel will enchant you from the moment you arrive.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 952 Rama IV Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Contemporary Bangkok City Centre Escape with Restaurant & Alfresco Pool
description:
Become immersed in all the exciting action within Bangkok’s city centre with a comfortable stay at the stylish PARKROYAL Suites Bangkok. Set in the city’s predominantly commercial zone, travellers visiting for both work and pleasure can take full advantage of this prime location, staying within minutes of shopping, dining and cultural attractions.

Trawl around this thriving metropolis on foot by day and easily return to recuperate within welcoming and calming interiors. Explore the fully equipped gym and sparkling pool for an active recovery or chill out in the evenings with a fuss-free delectable meal at the hotel’s own Spice Brasserie.
offer_address: 22 Sukhumvit Soi 6, Klongtoei, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Tranquil Mövenpick Bangkok Retreat with Four Restaurants, Luxe Spa & Wellness Clinic
description: Experience a grand slice of wellness luxury at this sprawling five-star Mövenpick sanctuary, nestled in the bustling heart of Bangkok. Ensconced amid lush tropical gardens, the resort offers an oasis of serenity with signature wellness facilities and thoughtfully designed rooms. Savour delectable culinary delights at the resort's four dining venues, including the Bittersweet bar where you can sip on craft cocktails and indulge in Mövenpick's famous Chocolate Hour.
offer_address: 2 Wireless Road, Lumpini Pathumwan, 10330 Bangkok, Thailand

title: Modern Bangkok Novotel Escape in the Heart of Sukhumvit with Rooftop Pool, Onsite Dining & Vodka Bar
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Thailand's capital with a stay at this centrally located Novotel hotel in Sukhumvit. Perfectly positioned in the heart of Bangkok's most exciting district, this stylish hotel offers easy access to the city's bustling shopping precincts, iconic landmarks and world-famous culinary offerings.

After a day exploring the city, return to the hotel to savour authentic Thai cuisine at Food Exchange Restaurant. Head to the top floor for a dip in the rooftop infinity pool before sipping signature cocktails at poolside RedSquare Bar - the first-ever international vodka bar - as you watch the sunset behind the dazzling city skyline.
offer_address: 27 Sukhumvit 4 Alley, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Stylish Bangkok City Escape on the Chao Phraya with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description: Riverside resplendence awaits with a five-star stay at Avani+ Riverside Bangkok Hotel. Savour unrestrained views of the mighty Chao Phraya from the comfort of your room, over acclaimed Brazilian-Portuguese plates at SEEN Restaurant & Bar Bangkok or by the hotel’s legendary ultra-slick rooftop infinity pool. Head to onsite live music bar Lost & Found for lavish feasts and decadent nightly entertainment or to Sugar Babies, Bangkok’s only candy bar, for the ultimate sweet fix.
offer_address: 257 Charoennakorn Road, Thonburi, Bangkok 10600, Thailand

title: Bangkok’s Blissfully Secluded #1 Hotel
description:
Find a slice of serenity amid the electric atmosphere of Thailand's capital at the blissfully secluded Sukhothai Bangkok. Surrounded by lush gardens, yet perfectly positioned to embrace all the city offers, this award-winning hotel - ranked #1 in Bangkok at the Travel + Leisure 2020 World’s Best Awards - is a sanctuary of serenity amid the buzzing metropolis. With its glam rooftop bars, towering skyscrapers and world-class dining, juxtaposed with traditional floating markets and street-food hawkers, Bangkok dazzles even the most seasoned travellers. Whether it's a city break or stopover between Thai islands, Bangkok is simply unmissable.

Ideally located in the heart of the business district, this urban oasis effortlessly blends traditional Thai décor and hospitality with modern facilities. Indulge yourself at Sukhothai Spa, with a salt-water lap pool, hammams, a sauna and steam room, plus an array of treatments to leave you feeling restored. You won’t even need to venture far to indulge in delicious food: the hotel is home to some of Bangkok’s best restaurants, including the award-winning Celadon, voted the best restaurant in the city by Travel + Leisure magazine.
offer_address: 13/3 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Ultra-Chic Five-Star SO/ Bangkok City Stay with Spa & Six Restaurants & Bars
description:
Spoil your senses with a stay at an outrageously fashionable sanctuary located in Bangkok’s lively entertainment district. Designed by couturier Christian Lacroix, this hotel blends French elegance with playful, modern design. Enjoy stunning city views from the rooftop infinity pool overlooking Lumphini Park, or work out in the SO/ FIT gym.

Dive into the stunning rooftop infinity pool or, for ultimate relaxation, visit the SO/ SPA for expert facial, body and beauty treatments. Surrounded by the vibrant energy of Bangkok’s temples, nightlife and street food, SO/ Bangkok offers a fashionable base for exploring this dynamic city.
offer_address: 2 North Sathorn Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

title: Ultra-Luxe Spacious Suites in the Heart of Bangkok
description:
Find yourself in the heart of Thailand's bustling capital with a luxurious stay at Cape House Langsuan. Listed in the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice awards 2021, the hotel blends comfort with convenience and style. Beautifully appointed suites feature spacious living areas, kitchen facilities and plush bedding. After a shopping spree at Siam Square - about a 20-minute stroll away -  escape the heat with a plunge in the outdoor pool. Feel your stresses soak away in the steam room and sauna or treat yourself to the hotel's renowned Italian restaurant, No.43 Italian Bistro.

The city's top attractions are within easy reach; picturesque Lumphini Park is around a 15-minute walk, while the BTS subway network is a convenient five-minute stroll from your front door. Fancy a big night on the town? Hop in a taxi, and in less than 20 minutes you'll be among the vibrant bars and restaurants of Khao San Road.
offer_address: 43 Soi Langsuan, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan District, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Downtown Bangkok Retreat near BTS SkyTrain with Onsite Dining & Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience urban living at this contemporary escape in bustling downtown Bangkok. Unwind with a cocktail by the sun-soaked rooftop pool, complete with city views, drop by The Eight Restaurant for both local and international bites, or grab a drink and snack at the swanky Sky Terrace Bar.

With the city's shopping district, the BTS SkyTrain and the Art & Culture Centre on your doorstep, you're free to shop 'til you drop or explore the city's heritage at ease. By night, explore Bangkok's vibrant markets, street food stalls and famed nightlife before returning to your homey abode.
offer_address: 927 Rama 1 Road, Wangmai, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Self-Contained Suites in Central Bangkok with Rooftop Pool, Sauna & Steam Room
description:
Eat, play and repeat in the City of Angels from the comfort of your self-contained suite in central Bangkok. This luxurious retreat is a short stroll from the Sukhumvit shopping district and the Asoke BTS Skytrain station, making it the perfect base for your Thai adventure. After a day of exploring, return to your urban oasis to lounge in style while overlooking the sparkling city below.

Enjoy sumptuous rooftop dining for breakfast, indulge in therapeutic massages or some time in the sauna, and take a dip in the rooftop pool to rejuvenate head-to-toe. Everything you need is right at your fingertips at Grand Mercure Bangkok Asoke Residence.
offer_address: 50, 5 Sukhumvit 19 Alley, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Ultra-Modern Bangkok Escape near Emporium Mall with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Experience sophistication at this ultra-chic hotel, perfectly situated in the vibrant heart of Bangkok. Just steps away from the BTS Skytrain Phrom Phong Station and the city’s prestigious EM District shopping centres, this hotel offers the ideal base for your Bangkok adventure.

Elevate your stay with a visit to the rooftop, where glittering views of the city skyline await. Unwind by the infinity-edge pool, sip on refreshing cocktails and savour light bites at Vue Bar. Satisfy your culinary cravings at The Market Restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner, or maintain your wellness routine at the fitness centre.
offer_address: 5.1 Sukhumvit Road, Soi 24, Khlong Tan Klong Toey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Award-Winning Shangri-La Bangkok Riverside Luxury
description: Immerse yourself in the culture, history and vibrant nightlife of Thailand’s capital with a riverside stay at Shangri-La Bangkok - voted one of the Top Hotels in Bangkok in the Conde Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards 2021. This glittering high-rise beside the water enjoys a prime location with direct access to the SkyTrain, public ferry terminal and bus links, making it easy to discover everything this vibrant cosmopolitan city has to offer. After busy days exploring, return to world-renowned five-star Shangri-La luxury, where six restaurants, three bars, a chocolate boutique, the dreamy Chi, The Spa and a health club await to relax and rejuvenate you.
offer_address: 89 Wat Suan Phlu Alley, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

vendor_name: AVANI Atrium Bangkok - Now Grand Mercure Bangkok Atrium
title: Sophisticated Bangkok City Break with Onsite Benihana Restaurant
description: Stay in the beating heart of Bangkok at Avani Atrium Bangkok Hotel, located within easy reach of the city's major sights, markets and nightlife. During warm days, spend it at the poolside bar sipping fresh fruit juices and enjoying hearty lunches, or enjoy an exciting Japanese feast at the onsite Benihana teppanyaki restaurant. Keep up to date with your fitness routine with AvaniFit, or opt for a more relaxing way to pass the time at the spa.
offer_address: 1880 New Petchaburi Road, Bangkok 10310, Huai Khwang, Thailand

title: Centrally Located Bangkok Shopper's Paradise with Rooftop Garden
description: Discover Bangkok's whirlwind charm when you stay at Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Siam, an IHG Hotel, located right in the heart of the city's famous Siam shopping district. Start your mornings right with a Grab&Go breakfast from the Great Room dining area. When you're not hitting the streets shopping til your heart's content at the nearby MBK Centre shopping mall, stay in and unwind in the rooftop garden where you can observe the city lights from great heights.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bangkok Siam, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 889 Rama I Road, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Tranquil Five-Star Oasis within the Heart of Bangkok
description: Discover a beautiful five-star oasis in the heart of Thailand with a luxurious stay at Kimpton Maa-Lai Bangkok, an IHG Hotel. Get lost in the tranquil atmosphere of this lush hotel, with an abundance of floor-to-ceiling windows bringing the surrounding greenery inside for the ultimate relaxing getaway. Explore the exotic culture of Bangkok by wandering the handsome streets or eat your way through the city as a local foodie, tasting the unique mix of sweet, sour, salty and spicy flavours.
location_description: Kimpton Maa-Lai Bangkok, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 78 Soi Ton Son, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Sophisticated Bangkok Novotel Escape in the Heart of Sukhumvit with Infinity Pool, Rooftop Bar & Onsite Dining
description:
Discover a world of modern comfort and Thai hospitality at this centrally located Novotel hotel in Sukhumvit. Perfectly positioned in the heart of Bangkok's most vibrant district, this stylish hotel offers easy access to the city's bustling shopping precincts, including the high-end EmQuartier and Terminal 21. Savour delectable Thai cuisine at the hotel's onsite restaurant, Gourmet Bar, or sip on refreshing cocktails at the Sky on 20 rooftop bar, offering panoramic views of the city skyline.

For relaxation, take a dip in the outdoor infinity pool or energise yourself at the InBalance fitness centre. The hotel is also conveniently located just a short stroll from the BTS Skytrain and MRT subway stations, making it easy to explore the city's  treasures.
offer_address: 19/9 Sukhumvit 20 Klong Toey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Modern Central Bangkok Escape with Daily Buffet Breakfast & Award-Winning Eateries
description: Experience the height of metropolitan luxury with a rejuvenating stay at Park Hyatt Bangkok, standing proud in the beating heart of Bangkok. Indulge in exquisite dining at the hotel's award-winning restaurants or enjoy panoramic city views from the stunning rooftop bar, all housed within an iconic architectural high-rise. Spend days exploring the buzzing sights and sounds of Thailand’s vibrant capital, and then find a moment for tranquillity with a relaxing treatment at PAÑPURI ORGANIC SPA.
offer_address: Central Embassy, 88 Wireless Road, Pathumwan 10330, Bangkok, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Art-Deco Escape with Belgian Rooftop Bar, Pool & Spa
description:
Placing you in Bangkok’s beating heart, this five-star address blends French chic with Thai vibrance, rising above Sukhumvit Road. From the moment you step into the lobby, adorned with Thai art and grand chandeliers, you can expect the exceptional. Lounge by the sparkling pool with a cocktail in hand, get pampered at Le Spa or kick back in the opulence of your room or suite.

Savour Italian fare at Bella Sera, fusion Japanese cuisine at Maison Mizuki and classic French baked delights at Le Macaron. For something more indulgent, head to Bangkok's first Belgian restaurant - Belga Rooftop Bar & Brasserie, perched on the 32nd floor and showcasing glittering skyline views. When it's time to explore, Sukhumvit's shopping, dining and nightlife await.
offer_address: 189 Sukhumvit Road Soi 13-15, Klongtoey Nua Wattana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Bangkok Five-Star Sky-High Luxury with Multi-Award-Winning Rooftop Restaurant
description:
Reach glittering heights at The Landmark Bangkok, an elegant skyscraper towering over the sparkling sights of Thailand's capital. Make this five-star hotel your home in the city and enjoy fabulous benefits including the 31st-floor rooftop restaurant Rib Room & Bar Steakhouse, an award-winning hotspot specialising in French cuisine prepared in a contemporary open-style kitchen. The hotel also offers eight further onsite bars and restaurants (including the traditionally British Huntsman Pub and Cantonese eatery Sui Sian), soothing treatments at Viva Jiva Spa, a fitness club with exercise classes and an outdoor pool.

Set on fashionable Sukhumvit Road, a short walk from BTS Skytrain station and the city's most exciting sights, The Landmark Bangkok couldn't be better placed for your foray into Thailand's captivating capital.
offer_address: 138 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Bangkok Central Pier
title: Contemporary Central Bangkok Stay on the Chao Phraya River
description: Embrace the vibrant heart of The Land of Smiles at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Bangkok Central Pier, an IHG Hotel. This city-centre haven is a stone's throw from the bustling Asiatique Night Market, where you can indulge in authentic Thai street food and unique shopping experiences. Or, unwind in the hotel's plush rooms after a day of exploring the Grand Palace or cruising the Chao Phraya River.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Bangkok Central Pier, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 513/13 Sathorn 23 Alley, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

title: Bangkok 5-Star Kempinski Village-Style Luxury with World-Class Wellness Centre
description: Discover a slice of leafy serenity in the middle of Bangkok's vibrant metropolis at the five-star Sindhorn Kempinski Bangkok. Kempinski is synonymous with luxury, and this is no exception: five exquisite restaurants and bars are guaranteed to set your tastebuds into a frenzy, whether it's with classic cocktails at the Firefly Bar or Japanese cuisine at Ki Izakaya. Wellness is at the forefront, with an entire floor dedicated to Sindhorn Wellness by Resense, home to an infinity pool, luxury day spa and fitness centre. When you're not making good use of your hotel's facilities, head out to explore the quiet, leafy grounds of Lumphini Park.
offer_address: 80 Soi Tonson, Lumphini, Pathumwan, 10330, Bangkok, Thailand

title: Elegant Bangkok Retreat with Lagoon-Style Pool & Four Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience a city break like no other with a stay at Century Park Hotel, where the hustle and bustle of Bangkok can be felt right at the doorstep. After a great night's sleep, discover an abundance of exciting temples, markets, restaurants and shops to keep your days packed full, all easily accessible by public transport. Wander to Victory Monument just down the road and mingle with the locals to get an understanding of how this fabulous city works, then, take a break from the neon lights and settle in for a day of complete relaxation by the hotel's lagoon-style pool and lush garden, with a good book in one hand and a cocktail in the other.
offer_address: 9 Ratchaprarop Rd, Makkasan, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Bangkok Stylish Inner-City Stay with Restaurant, Outdoor Pool & Sauna
description: Enjoy all the comforts of modern luxury in the beating heart of Bangkok at Holiday Inn Bangkok, an IHG Hotel. Glide through the opulent hotel lobby and settle in for a relaxing stay within the elegantly furnished hotel interiors. Venture around the city to nearby malls, attractions and restaurants, or stay within the sleek bounds of the hotel and indulge in fine dining at Ginger or a crisp drink at Beer Republic. Stretch out or take a dip in the glimmering outdoor pool to cool off.
location_description: Holiday Inn Bangkok, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 971 Phloen Chit Road, Lumpini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Centrally-Located Contemporary Bangkok Escape with Outdoor Pool & Wine Bar
description:
Embrace the eclectic spirit of Thailand's vibrant capital with a sophisticated stay at this Mercure urban oasis, strategically positioned in the city's heart. Take advantage of the hotel's prominent location which puts you within mere steps of trendy malls, hip eateries and the MRT Petchaburi and Makkasan Airport Rail Link Station, making it easy to reach any corner of the city.

Savour panoramic views of Bangkok from the hotel's floor-to-ceiling windows, laze around on a sunbed or take a refreshing dip in the sparkling outdoor pool on the 10th floor. When hunger strikes, head to The Station, the hotel's all-day dining restaurant, and tuck into myriad Asian and international delicacies and sip on exquisite cocktails at the M Wine Lounge.
offer_address: 1599 Kamphaeng Phet 7 Road, Makkasan, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Elegant Bangkok Urban Oasis with Rooftop Pool, Onsite Spa & Two Restaurants
description:
Find yourself in the vibrant centre of Thailand's spirited capital, Bangkok, with a stay at this sophisticated oasis. Nestled in the bustling Rama 9 district in Phetchaburi, this five-star abode offers dignified rooms and exceptional amenities, as well as seamless access to Bangkok’s cultural landmarks, culinary gems and shopping havens.

After a day of discovery, unwind at the tranquil rooftop pool on the fourth floor, sip refreshing cocktails at the Pool Bar or indulge in a pampering session at the spa. Savour Thai fusion cuisine at Public while admiring stunning city views or relish an epic gastronomic feast at the renowned Japanese steakhouse Benihana as you sample its teppanyaki, sushi and signature rolls.
offer_address: 1880 New Phetchaburi Road, Bang Kapi, Huay Kwang, Bangkok 10310, Thailand

title: Pullman Bangkok Luxury with Onsite Spa, Michelin-Rated Restaurant, Rooftop Bar & Pool
description:
Experience five-star Pullman luxury at this stylish retreat high above the Bangkok bustling streets. Savor Michelin-rated dining at Scarlett Wine Bar on the 37th floor, or enjoy cocktails at the rooftop bar 25 Degrees, home to one of Bangkok’s best burger joints. 

Unwind by the swimming pool or at the onsite spa after a day of exploring vibrant Silom Road, or take a short stroll to top attractions like Patpong Night Market, Lumphini Park and Mahanakhon Skywalk.
offer_address: 188 Silom Rd, Bangrak, Bangkok,10500, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Urban Retreat with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Bar
description: Boasting sweeping skyline views, Sindhorn Midtown Hotel Bangkok, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel, offers an upscale city break in the heart of Thailand's capital. Dine on authentic Thai dishes at Bangkok'78 restaurant, or indulge in some smooth spirits at The Black Cat whiskey bar. Choose indulgence with shimmering waters at Horizon Pool Bar, offering canapes and skyline views at the rooftop infinity pool, before retiring to an artistic guestroom for a restful night's sleep.
location_description: Sindhorn Midtown Hotel Bangkok, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 68 Soi Langsuan Rd, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Elegance with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Experience unparalleled luxury at this urban retreat offering exquisite comforts and next-level service. Revel in the city skyline from the rooftop infinity pool and bar, the perfect setting for a post-dip snack and tipple. Delight in Michelin-starred dining at Signature Bangkok or savour the finest sushi at YTSB, where Japanese cuisine meets the highest-quality ingredients.

Step outside to explore Bangkok’s rich cultural heritage or enjoy world-class shopping at nearby landmarks like Siam Paragon and CentralWorld. Return to the hotel and relax at the chic Piano Bar, where you can enjoy handcrafted cocktails and the smooth sounds of jazz, creating the perfect ambience for a memorable evening.
offer_address: 117 39 40, Phaya Thai Road, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

title: Contemporary Bangkok City Break near Major Shopping District
description: Get a taste of Thailand’s feverish metropolis at Holiday Inn Bangkok Sukhumvit, an IHG Hotel. Boasting a central location, the hotel places guests within walking distance of luxury shopping centre, Terminal 21, and lifestyle district ‘Emporium and EmQuartier’. Cool off with a dip in the oasis-like eighth-floor swimming pool, or dine at the opulent Maya Restaurant and Rooftop Bar and take in the boundless skyline over an expertly mixed cocktail and northern Indian plates.
location_description: Holiday Inn Bangkok Sukhumvit, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1 Sukhumvit 22, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

title: Central Avani Boutique Bangkok Escape with Rooftop Pool
description: Feel the pulse of Bangkok’s CBD with a stay at Avani Sukhumvit Bangkok, high above the trendy On Nut neighbourhood. Sitting within walking distance of On Nut BTS Station, the stylish haven is perfectly placed to explore Bangkok’s bright lights, world-class shopping and diverse culture like a true local. From the buzzing rooftop pool and bar, to expertly prepared dishes at the Greenhouse Restaurant and lavish spa, Avani Sukhumvit Bangkok Hotel will enchant you from the moment you arrive.
offer_address: 2089 Sukhumvit Rd, Phra Khanong Nua Watthana, Bangkok 10260, Thailand

title: Modern Central Bangkok Escape with Rooftop Bar, Johnnie Walker Whisky Lounge & Central Embassy Access
description:
Experience the height of metropolitan luxury with this rejuvenating Bangkok stay. Indulge in exquisite dining at the hotel's six premium restaurants and bars, finding panoramic city views at the pristine Penthouse Bar + Grill on the high-rise rooftop, next to the hotel's infinity pool.

Spend days exploring the buzzing sights and sounds of Thailand’s vibrant capital, and then find a moment for tranquillity during a relaxing treatment at PAÑPURI ORGANIC SPA.
offer_address: Central Embassy, 88 Witthayu Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

title: Central Bangkok Oasis with Nine Bars & Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Nestled in Bangkok's commercial heart yet feeling worlds away, the Grand Hyatt Erawan places you beside the iconic Erawan Shrine, perfectly positioned to soak up the capital's energy while enjoying a refined retreat from the bustle. Imagine stepping from the diplomatic district's sophisticated streets into your own slice of heaven.

Nine distinct restaurants and bars promise a culinary journey across continents, while the shimmering pool and world-class spa stand ready to wash away your travel fatigue. As Bangkok pulses around you, this privileged address offers the perfect balance of downtown excitement and plush comfort awaiting your return.
offer_address: 494 Ratchadamri Road, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand

vendor_name: Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok
title: Lavish Northern Bangkok Escape with Nine Restaurants & Tranquil Spa
description:
Feel the vibrant pulse of Bangkok from this five-star urban abode, perfectly positioned mere steps from the lavish Central Ladprao shopping mall. Indulge in world-class dining at the hotel's nine onsite restaurants offering Thai staples, delicious dim sum, modern European cuisine and Italian trattoria-style fare. Sip on refreshing cocktails at the hotel's lavish rooftop bar, rejuvenate body and soul with a soothing treatment at SPA Cenvaree.

If you wish to explore, find yourself within walking distance of designer stores, mouthwatering eateries, the verdant Wachirabenchathat Park, and the bustling Chatuchak weekend market. Venture deeper into the city with easy access to Phahon Yothin subway station, connecting you to all of the city's attractions within minutes.
location_description: Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok
offer_address: 1695 Phaholyothin Road, Ladprao, Chatuchak, Bangkok 10900, Thailand

title: Stylish Bangkok Downtown Luxury with Nine Restaurants
description: Discover a luxury hotel with an iconic design in an unrivalled location when you stay at Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel. Expect lavish decor, from crystal chandeliered ceilings to hand-painted silk murals and impeccably kept gardens. High-end facilities include nine exquisite restaurants, a tranquil day spa featuring VIVID IV Drip Bar, an anti-ageing and aesthetics hub, plus a swimming pool, barber shop, beauty salon, fitness centre, yoga studio and the Spice Spoons cooking class.
offer_address: 155 Ratchadamri Rd, Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330, Thailand
